sections.heading: Notification by beekeepers of bees located in a commercial agricultural area3-367
sections.text: 02.Notification by beekeepers of bees located in a commercial agricultural areaA. Before locating bees on an apiary site, the owner of the bees shall obtain the landowner's or lessee's permission and notify in writing
